SPEED & CONSUMPTION:
BASIS SUMMER DRAFT, UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS ON UNRESTRICTED PASSAGE NOT EXCEEDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3
AT SEA CONSUMPTION FULL SPEED:
BALLAST
ABOUT 13.5 KNOTS ON ABT 18.9 MTS VLSFO + 1.74 MT LSMGO
LADEN
ABOUT 13.25 KNOTS ON ABT 20.0 MTS VLSFO + 1.74 MT LSMGO
AT SEA CONSUMPTION ECO :
BALLAST ABOUT 12 KNOTS ON ABT 14.5 MTS VLSFO + 1.74 MT LSMGO
LADEN ABOUT 12 KNOTS ON ABOUT 16.3 MTS VLSFO + 1.74 MT LSMGO
IN PORT CONSUMPTION:
AT PORT MOORING OR LOADING OR DISCHARING
BASIS TWO A/E + BOILER:
AT PORT WORKING, 1.5 MT VLSFO + 3.0 MT LSMGO
IDLE, ONE A/E + BOILER: 1.0 MT VLSFO + 1.5 MT LSMGO
SULPHUR CONTENT - VLSFO, ISO 8217/2017, LSMGO (DMA) MAX 0.1 PCT SULPHUR CONTENT ISO 8217/2017
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND GIVEN IN GOOD FAITH ANY SAVING IN CONSUMPTION MUST BE OFF-SET AGAINST ANY SPEED UNDERPERFORMANCE, ANY SAVING IN TIME MUST BE OFF-SET AGAINST ANY EXCESS CONSUMPTION, ANY SAVING
IN FO MUST BE OFF-SET AGAINST INCREASED MDO AND VICE VERSA, AND ANY OVERALL SAVING ON INDIVIDUAL PASSAGE(S) MUST BE SET OFF AGAINST AN OVERALL LOSS ON OTHER INDIVIDUAL PASSAGE(S).
SPEED/CONSUMPTION FIGURES BASIS SUMMER DRAFT, UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS ON UNRESTRICTED PASSAGE NOT EXCEEDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3
IT IS EXPLICITY UNDERSTOOD AND AGREED THAT NO WARRANTY APPLIES WHILST SAILING IN RESTRICTED AREAS A/O I/O PORTS/CANALS/RIVERS, MANOEUVERING, PILOT TO PILOT, SAILING IN BAD WEATHER AND/OR IN NARROW/SHALLOW
WATERS WHEN THE VESSEL MAY CONSUMES MDO IN MAIN ENGINE. CONSUMPTION MAY INCREASE DURING BALLASTING/DEBALLASTING/BALLAST EXCHANGE OPERATION AT PORT/SEA.
'ABOUT' ON SPEED MEANS 0.5 KNOT ALLOWANCE AND 'ABOUT' ON BUNKERS CONSUMPTION MEANS 5% ALLOWANCE ON THE DESCRIBED DAILY BUNKER CONSUMPTION.
SPEED/CONSUMPTION UNDERPERFORMANCE CLAIM CAN ONLY BE SUBMITTED IN RESPECT OF PERIODS DURING WHICH THE VESSEL ENCOUNTERS WEATHER UPTO BEAUFORT 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEASTATE 3 (SIGNIFICANT WAVE UP TO 1.25
M MAX) AND/OR NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND/OR NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL WITH A MINIMUM STEAMING OF ATLEAST 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS.
VESSEL'S CRANES NOT TO BE OPERATED BY CREW BUT INSTEAD TO BE OPERATED BY QUALIFIED AND PROPERLY CERTIFIED SHORE PERSONNEL EMPLOYED AND PAID FOR BY CHARTERERS AND CRANE OPERATION ALWAYS AT CHARTERERS
ENTIRE RISK, RESPONSIBILITY AND EXPENSE WHO ARE TO FOLLOW OPERATING INSTRUCTIONS STRICTLY AS PER MANUFACTURERS OPERATING MANUALS.
CHARTERERS TO HAVE THE OPTION TO HAVE THE VESSEL RUN ON ECO SPEED AND CONSUMPTION AS DESCRIBED BY OWNERS. WHEN CHARTERERS ORDER THE VESSEL TORUN ON ECO SPEED, THIS SHALL CONSTITUTE COMPLIANCE WITH,
AND THERE SHALL BE NO BREACH OF, ANY OBLIGATION REQUIRING THE VESSEL TO PROCEED WITH UTMOSTAND/OR DUE DESPATCH OR ANY OTHER SUCH SIMILAR/EQUIVALENT EXPRESSION. VESSEL/OWNERS ARE NOT TO BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CLAIMS RELATED TO VESSELS SPEED AND/OR BUNKER CONSUMPTION
DURING ANY PERIODS WHERE THE VESSEL HAS BEEN REQUESTED TO PROCEED AT ECO SPEED.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
Best regards,
Maritime Shipbrokers Co., Ltd. Bangkok
